task.title: Managing metadata in memory
task.shortdesc: Tuning memory to retain or eject metatdata is set when creating or editing the bucket properties.

context.p: To specify the bucket memory size:

step.cmd: Navigate to Data Buckets > Create New Data Bucket (new bucket) or Data Buckets > bucket_name link > Edit (existing bucket).
In the Memory Size panel, specify either to retain metadata in memory or not.
step.info: Retaining metadata in memory needs more RAM, however, provides better performance for reads. Not retaining metadata in memory reduces RAM requirements.
